title: Children of Discord
description: OLD SCORE, NEW CITY: Following years of war and near-annihilation, the people of the city of Gastar have thrived without a major threat in two centuries, since the departure of the demon lord Zermon. Now, unknown to the people, dark forces from the past return to stake their claim. The boy Goldeon seeks to topple the city leaders by use of a secret army. Shevata, the teen assassin and the boy's greatest enemy, unexpectedly returns to the city by unlikely allies. The clash of the children sets of a series of events that place the people in the center. Who is the greatest danger, the two teens from the past, or their own war with each other? Can the city survive?
author: C.C. Cole
